text: Mwibuke ubwo mwirukaga muhunga ubudakebuka, mu gihe Intumwa (Muhamadi) yabahamagaraga iri inyuma yanyu (ngo mugaruke), nuko (Allah) akabahemba ishavu ryiyongera ku rindi. (Yarabibababariye) kugira ngo mutababazwa n’ibyabacitse (intsinzi n’iminyago) ndetse n’ibyababayeho (gutsindwa). Kandi Allah azi byimazeyo ibyo mukora
